medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient presents with 1 day of RUQ/epigastric pain, with episodes of abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting occurring every few months over the past several months. Previous admissions have shown improvement with GI cocktail but symptoms recurred.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Depression, history of fibroadenomas in breasts bilaterally, multiple lumpectomies for fibroadenomas, orthopedic foot surgery.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of gallstones. Father has hyperlipidemia.
medical_history.social_history: Started taking Wellbutrin 2 weeks ago. Not specified regarding smoking, alcohol, or other lifestyle factors.
